text: The 2014–15 Slovenian First League (known as the 1. NLB Leasing Liga for sponsorship reasons) was the 24th season of the 1. A liga, Slovenia's premier handball league. == Team information == The following 14 clubs competed in the 1. A liga during the 2014–15 season: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Arena !
